detail: Tech Stock gets sold off, if the interest rate increases
ZOOX a autonomous vehicle company is not public traded but owned by amazon

Policy and geopolitical noise may rise, but we expect stock-specific factors to lead equities. Low correlations should keep dispersion high, creating active opportunities, though concentration makes it hard to navigate
AI remains the core driver, supporting double-digit earnings growth this year.
Global semiconductor revenues are projected to surpass $1 trillion in 2026, driven primarily by AI-related demand.
Memory and logic ICs dominate growth; without them, industry revenue growth would drop sharply to single digits.
AI-driven data center and hyperscaler spending is accelerating, with top four hyperscalers investing roughly $500bn annually.
Computing and data storage will be the fastest-growing segment, exceeding $500bn in revenue in 2026.
Consumer electronics growth is supported by AI-enabled smartphones, higher memory prices, and device refresh cycles.
Semiconductor growth is highly concentrated, not broad-based, and vulnerable to macroeconomic and supply-chain risks.
